author: Nick Bryant
title: What this crisis reveals about US - and its president
description: Nations, like individuals, reveal themselves at times of crisis. So what does this global catastrophe tell us?
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 The usually packed Times Square is empty
